content: this pattern will walk you through creating an **easy breezy kitchen cloth** the finished size is approximately 6 25 16 cm wide and tall **yarn needed ** orange or color of choice **suggested brands ** suggested brands loops & threads classic cotton **other tools ** 5 5 mm hook darning needle **symbols** the stitch count of each round is displayed in round brackets **terms ** magic_ring chain chain st stitch single_crochet single_crochet hd half_double_crochet
